cs.CV, cs.HC, cs.RO, cs.MM, cs.AI. 

The paper discusses various techniques for gesture recognition, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The use of gestures for device control also suggests a potential connection to robotics (cs.RO). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of data-glove and vision-based approaches, which are common in multimedia (cs.MM) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) research.
